item.title: Using Postgres Inside Docker Container
item.description: These are my personal notes. Am running postgres docker image on a local linux box. If port 5432 is already in use, run this to see what process is using it: sudo ss -lptn 'sport = :5432' the above command will also display the pid using which you can kill the process. For example, if the pid is 1667, kill it by sudo kill 1667 Now sudo launch the shell script that runs the docker image.
